post.body: that's ADSL2 or ADSL+ isn't it? Think our exchange is being upgraded soon (Swindon gets stuff quite early).
that's far more than most UK users. We get something like 256-450K normally
what's your upload speed?
I just haven't looked at conferencing recently. Didn't realise how amazing it is now.
the webcam is coming through fine here. Sometimes I forget how awesome the internet is.
my dog watches the mouse pointer on my laptop. It's so funny.
rarely looking my best, for starters. Also, loud ranting when my CSS doesn't work
The main problem is that people overcook them. Sprouts done right are lovely.
There are reasons I don't have a webcam
Hello Paulie
IDS was the worst political leader of any party since Michael Foot.
well said. Firefox has had plenty of security issues.
it's very cool what people do with the Twitter API.
It doesn't. He's just a tedious, boring wanker. The R1 breakfast show should be a lot better.
morning Aaron
Who needs it with things like LinkedIn and Twitter?
twice as many as before I admitted liking Mariah Carey. There's also some Britney Spears and Justin Timberlake records I like.
Whittards coffees are not half bad. though.
I can recommend a tea/coffee company that I prefer to Whittards (mail order)
That's a whole hamper full of awesome,
That's 5 times more than last time.
Didn't the people in The Pier mind? ;)
Merry Christmas to you too, Ian.
tend to agree. Knew someone with an MS Access MCP, and he couldn't think outside of his narrow box.
I'm quite keen on Spectacle. Saw the one with The Police. Uncomfortable viewing.
Disco 2000 is, in my opinion, the least good track on Different Class. That's how good that album is.
Thanks. Just realised that I was rubbish with my parameters. But I think I've found a book now.
I don't know why you bought one. You're just not entering into spirit of the cult.
and you said no? ;)
Hi dungeekin. Not far away in Abingdon.
It's so depressing. The "loony left councillors wrecking Christmas" stories start earlier every year.
Reading something about people getting worked up over versions of Hallelujah. Off to record my hip-hop polka version.
Watching Hague doing PMQs. Pity he shot hit bolt too early as leader. Maybe post-Cameron.
I generally opt for Wogan. Which isn't entirely a sign of age.
I quite like the Mariah Carey christmas record? How many credibility points do I lose?
might have to buy the Ting Tings album. Kinda fun music for the car, I think.
have found a present for Mrs A and put it aside. Predict Swindon Town Centre will be full of blokes this afternoon.
if you want to follow Santa, he's on twitter as @noradsanta
can anyone recommend any amazingly nice books that I can give someone as a gift?
chocolate company that is at our local farmer's market. Not bad web site for a 1 woman business: http://cocoamano.co.uk
